metadata.title: Incentive Plans
metadata.description: Manage incentive plans (phantom share plan, stock option plans, etc.) for your company efficiently and professionally.
metadata.keywords: incentive plans, phantoms, stock options, flexible compensation, incentive management, vesting

hero.title: Incentive Plans
hero.description: The most professional way to create and maintain phantom and stock option plans. Sttok performs all calculations, documents, and scheduling for you. Plus, you can give beneficiaries access to their plan.

topFeatures.title: Main Features
topFeatures.description: Learn how managing Incentive Plans with Sttok allows you to optimize management and give access to your team.

items.title: Plan Customization
items.description: Create incentive plans tailored to your organization's needs.

items.title: Calculation Automation
items.description: Automate the signing, calculation, vesting, and tracking of plans for each employee.

items.title: Beneficiary Access
items.description: Employees can view and track the status of their incentives.

features.title: Incentive Plans
features.description: Sttok offers comprehensive and professional management of incentive plans for employees and collaborators. Discover all the features it offers you.

items.title: Multiple Plan Types
items.description: Create and manage various types of plans such as Stock Options, Phantom Shares, and more, adapting to your specific needs

items.title: Custom Configuration
items.description: Configure flexible vesting and cliff periods for each plan, exercise prices, or even individual conditions.

items.title: Beneficiary Access
items.description: Each beneficiary will have access to their profile with all updated data, including detailed calendars, documents, and simulations.

items.title: Real-time Reports
items.description: Automatically monitor the status of all options; granted, vested, and exercised, with instant updates.

items.title: Automatic Calculations
items.description: Perform automatic dilution calculations and cap table adjustments whenever changes occur in incentive plans.

items.title: Document Generation and Signature
items.description: Automatically create all necessary legal documents related to incentive plans as well as their digital signature.

items.title: Notification System
items.description: Send automatic notifications to beneficiaries about important milestones, such as upcoming vestings or options about to expire.

items.title: Simulations and Projections
items.description: Integration with the simulation module to make future projections and analyze different incentive plan scenarios.

items.title: Tender Offers. Sales
items.description: Manage sale offers, buybacks, or tender offers. Includes withholding calculations, contract signing, etc.
